# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O nfvo-driver-vnfm-zte-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/nfvo/drivers-vnfm-svnfm-zte-vmanager/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/drivers-vnfm-svnfm-zte-vmanager-1.1.0-20161207.010750-10.zip" && unzip -q -o -B nfvo-driver-vnfm-zte-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip && rm -f nfvo-driver-vnfm-zte-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip
EXPOSE 8410
RUN echo Open-O nfvo-driver-vnfm-zte 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/nfvo/drivers-vnfm-svnfm-zte-vmanager/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/drivers-vnfm-svnfm-zte-vmanager-1.1.0-20161207.010750-10.zip" > OPENO_VERSION
